Lanet olsun. Siktiğimin oyununda her şey iyi güzel de bu tanklar aşırı saçma. Özellikle Sacrifice bölümünde klavyeye kafa attım. Çok saçma. Ölmüyor, takımda ki herkesi sikiyor. Zaten ölümsüz orospu çocuğu, bir de 3 4 tane tank koymuşlar. Onun dışında silahlar az. İkincil silah olarak sadece tek tip tabanca var. Yakın dövüş silahları yok. Silah çeşitliliği az. Özel zombiler az oyun tank gönderip duruyor. Zorluk da farketmiyor bu arada. Her türlü sikiyor bu tank. Onun dışında bazı yerler çok karanlık hiç bir şey göremiyoruz ki bu bir co-op shooter oyunu. Gereksiz zorlamışlar. Zaten bundaki tüm senaryolar ikinci oyunda da var.

Раз уж никто не читает, напишу как играть в эту игру.
1)Заходишь в игру и вспоминаешь флешбеки с компьтерных клубов.
2)Смотришь на заставку загрузки "No Mercy (Нет Милосердию)", и опять вспоминаешь флешбеки.
3)Играешь в эту игру и вспоминаешь флешбеки.

The feeling of an original game is amazing. Left 4 Dead 2 may have taken everything this game has, but I will never forget the good old xbox 360 days with this game :)

Good co-op. If you want to relive the beta experience or keep the gimmicks, buy the second game. The second game comes with all 1st game's levels including the DLC level, The Passing, and The Last Stand. If you buy the second game, you get ALL levels including DLC, and has a bigger playerbase. Most custom campaigns made for the first are unobtainable unless you go outside of the Steam Workshop, and download them manually. 

Modders already made these type of mods for Left 4 Dead 2: 
- You can see below your torso
- Beta levels including beta survivors, beta weapons, and how dark it is. 
- There's a mutation called "L4D1 Coop" that removes newer special infected, keeps L4D1 styled infected, and exactly plays as how the first game should
- Infinite melee bashing
- Color corrections for all levels
- Beta sounds and L4D1 styled sounds
- L4D1-styled HUD including splash screens

If you get this first game, it will NOT come with The Last Stand. That's included in the second game. All the newer mutations are included in the second.

Diethyl azodicarboxylate, conventionally abbreviated as "DEAD" and sometimes as "DEADCAT", is an organic compound with the structural formula CH3CH2O2CN=NCO2CH2CH3. Its molecular structure consists of a central azo functional group, RN=NR, flanked by two ethyl ester groups. This orange-red liquid is a valuable reagent but also quite dangerous and explodes upon heating.

es sencillamente excelente, si es que te encanta el genero de los shooters y de los zombies, aunque debo admitir que es inferior al  2 tanto en graficos como en contenido, el multijugador es una maravilla aunque carese de variedad para los infectados, el cooperativo esta bastante bien pero sufre de varios bugs, que tambien estan el resto de modos de juego, pero si lo que quieres es un juego con maravillas graficas, el mejor coperativo del mundo, sin bugs y que sea increible no es lo que buscas, en cambio si lo que quieres es un juego que se cualquier pc lo corra facil, divertido y que quieras pasar un buen rato solo, con amigos o un multiugador con extraños l4d esta para ti y si quieres una experiencia mas completa l4d2 es una buena opcion.
